data.eml:eml: The adult male and male nymphal instars of Ceroplastes rusci (Linnaeus) (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Coccidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rainato, Alessio, Pellizzari, Giuseppina (2010): The adult male and male nymphal instars of Ceroplastes rusci (Linnaeus) (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Coccidae). Zootaxa 2357: 50-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275681
